mapper.update: update user set user_id = #{userId}, user_nick = #{userNick}, user_password = #{userPassword}, user_intro = #{userIntro}, user_Img = #{userImg}, user_keyword = #{userKeyword} where user_code = #{userCode}
mapper.select: select u.user_id `userId`, u.user_nick `userNick`, u.user_img `userImg`, u.user_intro `userIntro`, case when exists (select * from follow f where f.following_code = u.user_code and f.user_code = #{userCode}) then true else false end `isFollow` from user u where u.user_code in (select user_code from follow where following_code = #{userCode})
